name: Major Jam 4 Cosmic
description:
This is first person space shooter game.

Clicking start button or press 's' key to get the game start at title screen. Speed up dialogue by pressing 'esc' key in cutscene.

In the actual stage, control  with AWSD and Up/Down/Left/Right keys for movement. Use space for firing laser and left mouse for missile(powerful and hard to hit). It is advised to use gamepad for the control. Controlling with keyboard is really hard.

The player control spaceship fighting with enemy ships. Although the player is not damaged, the time does tick. Each level requires certain amount of killing enemy spaceships.

There are 4 levels currently. The first level is considered to be practice fields. Later levels gradually raise the difficulty. The last level(4th) is actually not able to be completed in normal way. 

Cutscene between each fight and ending have the dialogue of Traditional Chinese, which is due to the time unable to event translated by using Google service.

Tips: Don't go too far away from your mother ship.
